response.overview: The new recruit, Xiaoqiang, did not meet the standards in all trainings, and has always been the "trailer tail" in the team. However, he has the dream of becoming a soldier king, and he is led by the encouragement and platoon leader of Shihua Shiyao. Joined the invincible special team "hunting tiger team". But this is just the beginning. The arrogant captain of the cold arrogant, the smuggling of Shi Yao, the cruel drug lord, the seriously injured platoon leader, and the criminals who cross-border drug trafficking, have brought him into a new test. He will fight with the international criminal "Crow"
response.title: The King of Solider
